name: Frog game (Stijn Raaijmakers)
description:
I originally made this for a three hour jam themed 'Frog'.

Later I found out it was actually three days! So I allowed myself to spend a little more time on it (totalling at ten hours). I added:

  • Score system
  • UI layer, pause and quit
  • Improved map layout and graphics
  • Gameplay improvements
  • Mirroring water
  • Sound and music

Music downloaded from mixkit.co:

  • 70's Cop-Chase - Arulo
  • Brutal Mind - Michael Ramir C
